entry.title: zayne-labs/call-api: A zero-race-condition fetch wrapper packed with essential features - timeouts, retries, interceptors, and much more, all while still retained a similar API surface with fetch. Power and simplicity in one lightweight package.

entry.title: fairlan/events: A lightweight and flexible event management system designed to centralize event handling in JavaScript/TypeScript projects. This library simplifies event definitions, improves code readability, and facilitates debugging by providing a single source of truth for event declarations and usage.
entry.content: A lightweight and flexible event management system designed to centralize event handling in JavaScript/TypeScript projects. This library simplifies event definitions, improves code readability, and facilitates debugging by providing a single source of truth for event declarations and usage.
